Experience.workDiscription: I've spent almost 2.5+ years delivering innovative web solutions. Proficient in modern frontend technologies, I've collaborated on diverse projects, ensuring high-quality code, responsive designs, and seamless user experiences. Passionate about continuous learning, I've contributed to team success through effective problem-solving and communication skills.

Qualification.workDiscription: Experienced in IT and frontend development. Completed NewtonSchool full-stack course, mastering various technologies for robust application development and effective problem-solving.

Mechanical engineering graduate with strong IT skills and expertise in frontend coding and UI/UX design. Passionate about merging technical knowledge with creative design to deliver exceptional user experiences.

Diploma in Mechanical Engineering with proficient IT and frontend coding skills. Adept in merging engineering principles with technological expertise for innovative solutions. Passionate about leveraging cross-disciplinary knowledge for impactful projects.

Discription.label: JS
Discription.disc: High-level, interpreted, dynamic, prototype-based, scripting, multi-paradigm, first-class functions, supports object-oriented, imperative, declarative, functional programming.

Discription.label: HTML
Discription.disc: Create a gradient-filled circle with SVG, using linearGradient and circle elements.

Discription.label: CSS
Discription.disc: CSS styles webpage appearance; controls layout, colors, fonts, sizes, and animations.

Discription.label: nodejs
Discription.disc: Node.js is a JavaScript runtime that executes server-side code for web applications.

Discription.label: mongodb
Discription.disc: Flexible, scalable NoSQL database. Document-oriented. JSON-like documents. Widely used in modern applications.

Discription.label: ReactJs
Discription.disc: React.js is a declarative, efficient, and flexible JavaScript library for building user interfaces, developed by Facebook.

Discription.label: Angular
Discription.disc: Angular is a popular open-source web application framework maintained by Google, known for its robustness, scalability, and extensive features for building dynamic single-page applications (SPAs) using TypeScript.
